heading: HR01903
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO REPORTED CASES OF RAMPANT SMUGGLING OF CIGARETTES AND OIL PRODUCTS AND TO RECOMMEND TO THE BUREAU OF CUSTOMS (BOC) AND THE BUREAU OF INTERNAL REVENUE (BIR), THE NECESSARY ACTIONS AND POLICIES TO STOP AND PREVENT THE SMUGGLING ACTIVITIES
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-05-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01903
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO REPORTED CASES OF RAMPANT SMUGGLING OF CIGARETTES AND OIL PRODUCTS AND TO RECOMMEND TO THE BUREAU OF CUSTOMS (BOC) AND THE BUREAU OF INTERNAL REVENUE (BIR), THE NECESSARY ACTIONS AND POLICIES TO STOP AND PREVENT THE SMUGGLING ACTIVITIES
